section.title:
tax registrations
master list of Tax Registrations
section.para: Tax Registrations are the registration numbers used by Tax Authorities to identify businesses and/or individuals. An Employer Identification Numbers (EIN) is an example of a Tax Registration Number. Use the Tax Registration list for entering Tax Registration Numbers related to your Company.

tip.para: Tax Registration information for individual Customers and Vendors is stored on the Customer and Vendor master files.
